APP.TITLE: Guess a City
APP.SUBTITLE: Identify Danish cities using only roads and water
APP.FOOTER: Built with Angular & MapLibre GL | Data: OpenStreetMap & Statistics Denmark

START.DESCRIPTION: Test your knowledge of Danish cities by identifying them from their road networks and waterways.
START.STEP1: Choose your difficulty and number of rounds
START.STEP2: Study the map showing only roads and water
START.STEP3: Tap the correct city name from the four choices
START.STEP4: Build up your streak for a high score!

SETTINGS.TITLE: Game Settings
SETTINGS.DIFFICULTY_EXPLANATION: Difficulty controls which cities you get. Easy = large cities, Medium = mid-size cities, Hard = small cities.

CONTROLS.ROUND_COUNT_DESCRIPTION: How many cities to guess per game.

RESULTS.NEW_HIGH_SCORE_MESSAGE: You achieved a streak of {{score}} cities!
